data.text: @covenantnations Amen in the name of God!,.

@covenantnations Indeed, there's nothing impossible to the LORD our Father. The sound of 50 days of fasting, especially the first 10 days sounded impossible but look, see, how far the LORD has brought us...💯👌❤️ https://t.co/KdCdNe8M2l

Psalm 24:10 
Who is [He then] this King of glory? The Lord of hosts, He is the King of glory. Selah [pause, and think of that]!

Shalom 

#cnc50daysofprayerandfasting
#day49
#cncfamily #covenantnationschurch #forthekingdomandthelamb https://t.co/N7HI6N48fI
Psalm 24:9 - Lift up your heads, O you gates; yes, lift them up, you age-abiding doors, that the King of glory may come in. https://t.co/tjiPi8tKzM
...... thanks to the LORD who saw us through all these years, and the leaders He has protected for His will to be done on earth as it is in heaven. https://t.co/w8oJTuzQEs
